data.system_settings: MacOS 10.12.3 and Windows 10 x64, latest canary
data.actual_result: The 3 checkboxes behind the channel you muted flicker, same for the mute icon (it unmutes than mutes again)
data.expected_result: @‘everyone and @‘here are suppressed, nothing else happens
data.short_description: muted channels flicker on suppressing everyone/here notifications
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Notification Settings on a server - Mute the top channel (just so you can see it better) - Check the Suppress @‘everyone and @‘here button
